          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion de la lumière  dans des miroirs</string>
            <string language="en">Light reflection in mirrors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Helle Reflexion in den Spiegeln</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão clara nos espelhos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione chiara in specchi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά αντανάκλαση στους καθρέφτες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión ligera en espejos</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Quatrième sur six illustrations montrant un rayon de lumière heurtant un miroir suivant différents angles.</string>
            <string language="en">Fourth of six illustrations showing a ray of light striking a mirror at different angles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Angles</string>
            <string language="en">Angles</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viertel von sechs Abbildungen, die einen Strahl 
des Lichtes einen Spiegel in den unterschiedlichen Winkeln anschlagend
zeigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fourth de seis ilustrações que mostram um raio 
da luz que golpeia um espelho em ângulos diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un quarto di sei illustrazioni che mostrano 
un raggio di luce che colpisce uno specchio agli angoli differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέταρτο έξι απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μια ακτίνα 
του φωτός που χτυπά έναν καθρέφτη στις διαφορετικές γωνίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cuarto de seis ilustraciones que muestran un rayo
de la luz pulso un espejo a diversos ángulos.</string>
          </description>
